name: Average age at which not employed persons started receiving a retirement pension  by sex and main labour status just after leaving last job  : Not employed persons : Males : Unemployed : France
description:
Results from the 2006 LFS (Labour Force Survey) ad hoc module on 'transition form work into retirement'.
Full metadata at: http://epp.eurostat.ec.europa.eu/cache/ITY_SDDS/EN/lfso_06_esms.htm
